channel.title: CHIPcade - Arcade Chip Emulator
channel.description: CHIPcade is a 16-bit retro arcade chip… or at least it thinks it is. Program it on macOS and iPadOS to create your own classic-style games — no soldering iron required. Features Authentic* 16-bit arcade chip with 8 general-purpose registers and 4 user input registers. Powerful graphics co-processor with 8 layers and 255 hardware sprites. CHIPcade Script — a flexible, assembly-flavored scripting language. Built-in data sections, audio support, and customizable palette. Written in Swift and Metal for native performance on Apple hardware. Created games run on macOS, iOS, and tvOS. *Okay, it’s all software. But your game won’t know the difference.

item.title: News
item.description: v0.1.0 (2024-11-XX) First version Started CHIPcade Development Mid 2024 Another journey begins
